title: Clarisse Agbegnenou - the French fighter on judo, being an 'ambitious' Scorpio, and more
description:
It's been a long and torturous time on the sidelines for Clarisse Agbegnenou. The Olympic silver medallist and four-time world champion is back in action at the European Championships this week. She sat down with the Olympic Channel Podcast to talk horoscopes, her dramatic start to life, and the difference between confidence and ambition.

Article about the 2020 European Judo Championships.

SUBSCRIBE for inspiring interviews about the Olympics every Wednesday.
